Yusuke Takamatsu

EMail: yusuke@sslab.ics.keio.ac.jp / sleepingforest03@gmail.com

Profile

I am currently a Ph.D. student at Keio University. I received his B.E. and M.E. degrees from Keio University in 2010 and 2012, respectively. I am a student member of IPSJ. My research interests are web security, web attack, and vulnerability analysis.

Publications

Conference Publications

Clickjuggler: Checking for incomplete defenses against clickjacking
Yusuke Takamatsu and Kenji Kono
In Proc. of 12th Annual Conference on Privacy, Security and Trust (PST 2014), pp.224---231, Toronto, Kanada, Jul. 2014.

Automated Detection of Session Management Vulnerabilities in Web Applications
Yusuke Takamatsu, Yuji Kosuga, and Kenji Kono
In Proc. of 10th Annual Conference on Privacy, Security and Trust (PST 2012), pp.112--119, Paris, France, Jul. 2012.

Automated Detection of Session Fixation Vulnerabilities
Yusuke Takamatsu, Yuji Kosuga, and Kenji Kono
In Proc. of 19th international conference on World Wide Web (POSTER SESSION in WWW 2010) , pp.1191--1192,
Raleigh, NC, USA, Apr. 2010.
